column4: hi i made a update with adept-manager (icon in kicker) it crashed with sig11 after installing all before getting the message that all was installed sucessfully (there is a small progress abr, it loads  often a window when there is a new kubuntu version to upgrade), there it crashed

ok, then you can run these commands (in this order) to restore some sanity. Pastebin all output please so I can see how bad it is.
sudo dpkg --configure -a -> new prompt, sudo apt-get -f install, install remove and upgrade all 0 then prompt, sudo apt-get dist-upgrade -> nothing to upgrade /same as -f install
just to be sure, run this: sudo update-initramfs -u so your initramfs is definitely ok
